scenes.background: You acknowledged Bobs feedback about being harsh. Monica later approaches you and says:
scenes.description: I overheard you and Bob. Are you really trying to support me?

options.text: Yes, I'm committed to finding ways to make your workload more manageable.
options.analysis: You reassured Monica of your intentions, reflecting strong perception, empathy, and motivation.

options.text: I am, but you also need to communicate when you're overwhelmed.
options.analysis: You acknowledged your support but emphasized the need for Monica's communication, showing good self-regulation and motivation.

options.text: Of course, but it's a two-way street. We both need to work on this.
options.analysis: You highlighted mutual responsibility, showing strong motivation but lower empathy and perception.
